channel.title: Jamstack on ryan.c
channel.description: Recent content in Jamstack on ryan.c

item.title: Import Wordpress Nested Comments into Hugo
item.description: I’m currently in the process of converting my most complex Wordpress site into a Hugo site, and comments proved to be one of the greater challenges. My approach went from screw comments, to let’s use Disqus, to no let’s do this right and use a static comment system.

item.title: I'm Late to the JAMStack Party
item.description: It turns out my new found fascination with decentralized websites isn’t specific to them being decentralized. The movement of static sites has a place on the current web too – JAMStack. For the past year people have been researching ways to take away the traditional centralized back end, and it’s pretty neat.
